00001 <?php
00002 
00003 /**
00004  * @package kata_component
00005  */
00006 
00007 /**
00008  * A component for object oriented session handling using standard filesystem cookies 
00009  *
00010  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00011  * @package kata_component
00012  */
00013 class SessionComponent extends baseSessionComponent {
00014 
00015     /**
00016      * setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session. is done lazy (only when needed)
00017      * @param $forRead boolean if true we dont initialize the session if no sessioncookie exists
00018      */
00019     protected function startupSession() {
00020         $this->initSessionParams();
00021         $this->initCookie();
00022         @session_start();
00023         $this->renewCookie();
00024     }
00025 
00026     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00027 
00028     /**
00029      * read value(s) from the session container.
00030      * returns all currently set values if called with null
00031      * returns null when nothing could be found under the name you gave
00032      * @param string $name name under which the value(s) are to find
00033      */
00034     public function read($name = null) {
00035         if (CLI) {
00036             return null;
00037         }
00038         if ($this->initSession(true)) {
00039             if (empty($name)) {
00040                 return $_SESSION;
00041             }
00042             if (isset($_SESSION[$name])) {
00043                 return $_SESSION[$name];
00044             }
00045         }
00046         return null;
00047     }
00048 
00049     /**
00050      * write mixed values to the session-component.
00051      * @param string $name identifier, may contain alphanumeric characters or .-_
00052      * @param mixed $value values to store
00053      */
00054     public function write($name, $value) {
00055         if ($this->preamble($name, false)) {
00056             unset($_SESSION[$name]);
00057             $_SESSION[$name] = $value;
00058             return true;
00059         }
00060         return false;
00061     }
00062 
00063     /**
00064      * delete values stored under given name from the session-container
00065      * @param string $name identifier
00066      */
00067     public function delete($name) {
00068         if ($this->preamble($name, false)) {
00069             unset($_SESSION[$name]);
00070             return true;
00071         }
00072         return false;
00073     }
00074 
00075     /**
00076      * destroy any current session and all variables stored in the session-container with it
00077      */
00078     public function destroy() {
00079         @session_destroy();
00080         $_SESSION = null;
00081         $this->clearCookie();
00082     }
00083 
00084 }
